desc: Need help to go through existing app with our COMMENTS model which tracks messaging between players; on news; comments and messages from system to the user. You will need to improve the existing screens (3-4) and make sure the information from the COMMENTS model is retrieved and filtered for the above. You must have UI and frontend design experience, with an eye for details.SCOPEDevelop, design UI and test using hybrid mobile application (Android and iOS on Ionic framework).Fix the UI screens (comments made by me, comments made to me, system messages, comments on news) and bind the client app to the backend API so that the screens return the correct information . You will be required to fix some some of the backend API services (if required); you are also required to complete and wire up the calls the backend APIs and work with the API developers for functionality requests (Loopback JS framework);FUNCTIONALITY1. Need to query, sort and filter the backend COMMENTS model (backend API available)2. Make sure the screens correctly display the information from the COMMENTs model3. Make sure appropriate authorisations are enforced4. Mostly UI and ionic app work.5. With some nodejs/mongodb modifications (if any)5. Ionic framework app + [url removed, login to view] backend6. Testing and Documentation for DeliveryFURTHER BACKGROUND-The full requirement and specification document will be discussed with the successful bidder.-For the right developer this will turn into a stable long term partnership with further modular work-IP and copyrights will be unconditionally assigned to us-Sub contractors need not apply.PAYMENT:-Milestone payments will be created on progress.-Contract must be signed in order for project to be regarded as completed.-Release of payments only on completion of project, not for achieving milestones (this includes post deployment period in which we will need to ensure your developed functionality is free from defect and functions as required)-Full payment will be released to you within 5 business days after the project is satisfied, approved and contract signed.Mention in your reply: "IONIC+NODEJS+API" so we know you've read the project brief.PS: Preference if you could also read Chinese
title: Ionic App needs to display and filter data from our loopback.io backend on a COMMENTS model -- 3

desc: We are looking to build a single master app with the following features:We have 70 small apps. We need to build a single app that will be in communication with all these apps.The new app should be able to collect information such as user's data usage, network speed, time spent and location information from the corresponding apps.Also, this new app should be able to handle 5000 requests /sec.The new app should use Kafka and Cassandra technologies to stream and handle the data in real-time.This new app then should be able to provide various analysis from the data captured and also push notifications back to these 70 apps.that the new app will be in communication with 2000 request per secondsystem needs to be designed as aboveData usage will be measured via the new appUser's time when using the app will be specified according to wifi and mobile data usagelocation information needs to be gatherednetwork speed needs to be measured
title: a simple Data Analytical app using Kafka and cassandra technologies

desc: Please don't Apply if you are Agency , Working for Agency or are working as freelancer as part time.I’m looking for a web developer to create a website, using any language, the database must be accessible using REST API.Both the bootstrap website and the Mobile App Must use the REST API to make calls to the database.At some point there would be a mobile Apps made for this website for Android and IOS.  They would be using the API.Requirements for the Website are Below:There are going to be Businesses1.	Each business would have its own attributes2.	Each business should abilities to get reviews from Customers3.	There can be many types of Businesses4.	Each Business Should be able to offer a Service5.	Service could have promotional pricings  (Removed)6.	The Business is going  to have email address to which the service orders are sent to.7.	Customer can easily get contact information of the Business from there phones8.	Each Business should be able to have up to 1000 locations  (Removed)There are going to be Business Owners1.	My company should be able to get monthly fee from each business that registers with Website, per year cost2.	The Business owner should be able to manage all aspects of business, add services, edit services and adjust pricing3.	There are can be multiple people managing a single Business (removed)4.	Only my company can remove reviews of a Business or remove the business from the website5. Service price can be $0 which would appear as "Free" to end userThere is going to be user interface1.	The web interface must now  must know which time zone the customer is in2.	There are going to be 20 – 40 types of services the user can select3.	Depending on service there are going to be other options ( sub-Categories)4.	One of the options is going to be Business Ratings + 4 starts and up  or “We Recommend”  (REMOVED)5.	There is going to be a pricing option, like (no more than $30 dollars for this service) (REMOVED)6.	Time range within which you need to do service,  this day and etc …7.	Advance options (business in 20 miles radius and etc)8. The backend of the website would be running in UTC time (front end time would be local timezone to the user)Search Results1.	The search results must show the businesses that best meet the customer criteria2.	Customer must be able to Schedule a Appointment for the given service for shop times available3. the  services of business should not show up when the business  is closedCustomer Reviewing the Business1.	0 to 5 star rating can be given to a business by a customer for each service processed by our platformAPI Integration Required: Other, Payment Processor, Social MediaAPI Integration Required: Social Media, Payment ProcessingPlease don't Apply if you are Agency , Working for Agency or are working as freelancer as part time.
title: NO AGENCY Looking to create a eCommerce Website with laravel php framework REST API mySQL

title: Build a business App

desc: We have a desktop application developed in FIORI which has screen to push deals and coupons. In order to show this at a user's phone we need app. Also user has to login/subscribe. So mobile app will be integrated with FIORI. Deals will show following1. Login screen2. My account - past history of expired coupons and deals (period can be controlled from desktop).  This will have first name, last name, phone, address, email, Birthday DD MM, Preferred deal categories (using a button customer can select using check boxes out of 10-20 categories)Button to subscribe deals and unsubscribe3. Deals and Coupons Screen - like any standard add fordeal# date validity up to coupon details Single Use Y/N4. Click on deal then bar code can be displayed5. Forward the deal to email (integrates with default email)6. Not in Scope of this project right now: Current FIORI application will be converted into open UI5/HTML5 also (FIORI is pretty close to Open Ui5).7. Not in Scope of this project right now:  This desktop application will be integrated with customer master to get customers of town based on zip code. As of now we will use our table to fill customers in using flat file transfers at desktop based application. So store will have active customers in application also.
title: Mobile App Development (Android & iOS both)

desc: i need a  senior developer they can make a gateway using psd2psd2 is a bank solution where you can withdraw money from the sender's bank account and send the money to the recipient's bank account automatically.Here's a video describing how psd2 works [url removed, login to view]You should also be able to find psd2 bank api that we need in the gatewaythe gateway should also be able to send a transaction fee and send it to my account as an example user a sends 100 usd to userb but he pays 0.10 usd to allow to send the money so the money he sends to userb will be sent to userb bank The account and transaction fee will be sent to my bank account gateway to be integrated into our apple and android app
title: open bank api  psd2 gateway
